project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Forestry Development in Poor Areas Project is to develop forest resources in poor areas of central and western China on a sustainable and participatory basis to support poverty reduction, forestry development, and improved environmental management.  The project components include the establishment of timber plantations and economic forest crops, including bamboo, fruit, nut and medicinal trees.   The technical support services components include: (a) a planting stock development program; (b) a training and extension program; (c) a rural infrastructure program; and (d) a monitoring and evaluation program.  The Township and Village Enterprises (TVE) component will provide sub-loans to support the development of small-scale, labor-intensive, commercially oriented Tees in the forestry sector, such as pine resin extraction, bamboo processing, wicker  works, edible forest product processing, and parquet and veneer production.

P046952.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>贫困地区林业发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>该项目将在可持续和参与的基础上发展中国中西部地区的林业资源。该项目将进一步推进扶贫事业、林业发展和改善中国的环境管理。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
